meanings.definition: A group of antifungal medications used to treat various fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed clotrimazoles to treat the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought clotrimazoles from the pharmacy to cure her athlete's foot.
meanings.sent3: The clotrimazoles danced their way into the fungus and defeated it with ease.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny warriors, clotrimazoles fought against the invading fungi in my body.
meanings.sent5: The power of clotrimazoles was evident as the fungal infection disappeared rapidly.

meanings.definition: The active ingredient in certain antifungal creams and medications.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to check if clotrimazoles is listed as an ingredient in the antifungal cream.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained how clotrimazoles works to eliminate the fungus effectively.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous clotrimazoles in the cream played hide and seek with the fungi on my skin.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt like a battlefield where clotrimazoles fought bravely against the invading fungi.
meanings.sent5: I could almost see the tiny molecules of clotrimazoles attacking the fungus under a microscope.
